trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the transport must ensure that the URI provided for the service to listen on is unique or can be used exactly as provided.
trans-unit.target: 전송에서 수신 하도록 서비스에 대해 제공 된 URI의 고유한 지 또는 제공 된 그대로 사용할 수 있는지 확인 해야 하는지 여부를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The URI for the endpoint on which a service listens can be set programmatically using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> property and the value of the ListenUriMode for that endpoint is set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 프로그래밍 방식으로 사용 하 여 서비스가 수신 대기 끝점에 대 한 URI를 설정할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>속성과 해당 끝점에 대 한 ListenUriMode 값 사용 하 여 설정 되는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is Explicit.

The value of these properties may also be set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A> property and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여 이러한 속성 값을 설정할 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A>속성 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A>속성.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the ListenUriMode is set to Unique the transport is responsible for creating a unique URI.
trans-unit.target: Unique ListenUriMode의 값이 설정 되어 전송 되는 고유 URI를 만들기 위한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Different transports used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] generate this unique URI differently - For TCP in exclusive mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `false`) this means binding to a uniquely available port number.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하는 서로 다른 여러 전송을 [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 배타 모드에 대 한 TCP 다르게-이 고유한 URI 생성 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> 은 `false`) 사용 가능한 고유의 포트 번호에 바인딩됩니다.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - For TCP in port sharing mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `true`) and for all of the other existing [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transports, this means appending a unique path (a GUID) to the end of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -TCP 포트 공유 모드의에서에 대 한 (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> 은 `true`) 및 모든 다른 기존 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] 전송, 즉 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> 의 끝에 고유한 경로 (GUID)가 추가</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is set to Explicit mode, the transport uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> exactly as it is provided, without modifying it to make it unique.
trans-unit.target: 때의 값은 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>Explicit 모드를 사용 하 여 전송으로 설정 되어는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>고유 하 게 수정 하지 않고 제공 된 대로 정확 하 게.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the transport should use a transport-specific mechanism to ensure that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*> is unique.
trans-unit.target: 전송 되도록 전송별 메커니즘을 사용 하도록 지정 된 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*>고유한.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*>
